ThoughtDef.label: Hungry
ThoughtDef.description: I haven't eaten in a while.

ThoughtDef.label: Urgently hungry
ThoughtDef.description: The hunger pangs are clawing my insides. I need food or I'll starve soon.

ThoughtDef.label: Starving
ThoughtDef.description: I just want something - anything - to eat. I can feel my body wasting away. It hurts...

ThoughtDef.label: Tired
ThoughtDef.description: I haven't slept in a while.

ThoughtDef.label: Very tired
ThoughtDef.description: I'm so tired. I just want to lay down and rest for a few minutes...

ThoughtDef.label: Exhausted
ThoughtDef.description: I'm so exhausted I can barely stand. My eyelids have lead weights on them. Let me sleep...

ThoughtDef.label: Ugly environment
ThoughtDef.description: This place is unpleasant to be in.

ThoughtDef.label: Very ugly environment
ThoughtDef.description: This place is really unpleasant. I don't want to be here.

ThoughtDef.label: Hideous environment
ThoughtDef.description: This place is unbearable. Get me out of here...

ThoughtDef.label: Pleasant environment
ThoughtDef.description: This place is nice.

ThoughtDef.label: Very pleasant environment
ThoughtDef.description: I really like this place. It's beautiful.

ThoughtDef.label: Beautiful environment
ThoughtDef.description: This place is beautiful. It lifts me up and makes me feel alive.

ThoughtDef.label: Cramped environment
ThoughtDef.description: This place is really closed-in. I feel like I have no space to breathe.

ThoughtDef.label: Very cramped environment
ThoughtDef.description: It's claustrophobic in here. I have nowhere to move. I feel like a rat in a tiny cage.

ThoughtDef.label: Spacious interior
ThoughtDef.description: This is a really comfortably open indoor space.

ThoughtDef.label: In darkness
ThoughtDef.description: I've been in the dark for a while. I don't like it.

ThoughtDef.label: Cabin fever (mild)
ThoughtDef.description: I've been cooped up inside for days. I need to get outside.

ThoughtDef.label: Cabin fever (serious)
ThoughtDef.description: I've been trapped like a rat in here for so long. I desperately need to get outside or I'll go crazy!

ThoughtDef.label: Naked
ThoughtDef.description: I'm naked. This is humiliating.

ThoughtDef.label: Imprisoned
ThoughtDef.description: I hate being locked up.

ThoughtDef.label: Sharing bedroom
ThoughtDef.description: Sharing a room with others is annoying. I want some privacy.

ThoughtDef.label: Colonist left unburied
ThoughtDef.description: One of us died and we're just leaving them lying in the open. Nobody should be left like that. People deserve a decent burial.
